# Varietys of Democracy

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#vdem
googlesheets4::read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aw_byhiC4b_0XPcTDtsCpCeJHabK38i4pCmkHshYMB8/edit#gid=0", range = c("B653:N708"), col_names = F) %>%
  select(Variable = 1, Concept = 2, Definition = 4, Values = 5,  Class = 6, Label = 13) %>% 
  arrange(Label) %>%
  knitr::kable(.) %>%
  pack_rows("Democracy and Sociopolitical System", 1, 49, bold = T) %>% 
  pack_rows("Economics Relationships and Employments", 50, 56, bold = T) %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 10) %>% 
  remove_column(6)

```
